about_the_game:
“Just Cube” is a challenging 2D platformer that takes you to 12 unique locations full of challenging obstacles, epic boss battles and non-stop tension. Each location is a brand new challenge that will test your skills and reflexes, demanding precise movements and excellent strategy.

This game isn't just about getting from point A to point B - you have to face countless traps that stand in your way. And at the end of each location, an epic boss battle awaits you, which will try to stop you from continuing your journey.

But that's not all! The game also offers the challenge of competing for the best time. Your goal will be to complete the game in the shortest possible time. Remember that every mistake costs you precious seconds.

Game features:

  • 12 unique and challenging locations.

  • Epic boss battles that will test your dexterity and strategy.

  • High difficulty level that will provide hours of intense fun.

  • Get the best time - achieve perfection!

Do you have enough determination to overcome all obstacles and complete the game in the shortest possible time?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Get ready for a challenge! Discover 12 unique locations full of obstacles, epic boss fights and dynamic action. Test your skills, reflexes and determination to complete the game in record time!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
